Text:
Latest version is 3.16, and as of Jan 2010, it is now freeware. You can download it from the official site:

http://www.plextor-digital.com
-> Downloads -> Software and Utilities
To be more specific, Plextools Professional XL is now freeware.  There was always a free Plextools 3.xx LE version before.

Nevermind. Forget 3.16. It seems that it is buggy.
http://club.myce.com/f43/px-760sa-plextools-prof-xl-3-16-audio-offsets-248745/
